tool_description:
Simple Bol.com scraping API. Request EAN code of a product and we'll return prices & availability. All within a blink of an eye and in JSON format. 
This API is useful for monitoring current prices on Bol.com. Both for Bol.com offerings & third-party sellers.
name: Bol.com scraper
title: Bol.com scraper

api_list.name: price / availability
